title: CURAAI — VIRTUAL HEALTH ASSISTANT
description: A production-ready Flask-based AI health assistant that provides medical guidance using Google's Gemini AI. Features include security, error handling, monitoring, deployment-ready architecture with interactive 3D background, and comprehensive medical safety protocols.

title: KEYSTONE QMS — ENTERPRISE QUALITY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
description: Developed a real-time, full-stack platform to digitize the quality assurance workflow in a manufacturing environment. Engineered a role-based system for 8 user types to report, track, and analyze product defects from initial report to final resolution.

title: LIVE CRICKET SCORE API — WEB SCRAPER & API SERVER
description: Created a Python application to scrape live cricket scores and match data from The Indian Express using BeautifulSoup. Developed a lightweight backend API with Flask to serve the parsed data in a structured, real-time JSON format.

title: MEETING WHISPERER — AI-POWERED MEETING NOTES
description: Designed an intelligent web app that transcribes meeting audio and generates structured summaries using OpenAI APIs. Built with React and a .NET backend to automatically extract and track action items from conversations.

title: IOCL HSE PORTAL — ENTERPRISE COMPLIANCE SYSTEM
description: Automated a manual HSE compliance workflow by developing a secure enterprise portal using ASP.NET Core MVC, enhancing operational efficiency. Implemented a multi-level approval system featuring Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for 8 distinct user roles.

title: PORTFOLIO WEBSITE — RESPONSIVE DESIGN
description: A responsive portfolio website built with modern web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Features smooth animations and mobile-first design with interactive elements.

title: TASK MANAGEMENT API — RESTFUL SERVICES
description: A comprehensive REST API for task management built with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. Includes authentication, CRUD operations, and advanced filtering capabilities for enterprise use.

title: EXPENSE TRACKER — FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT APP
description: A comprehensive expense tracking application with data visualization features. Built with React, Node.js, and Chart.js for interactive financial insights and budget management.
